title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a.
Mnemonics
a. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName
b. The label could say 'Select destination type:'
c. Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)
d. Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'.
e. Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
f. Destination type can be source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo-changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
The browse button size is too small.
The title is used for long text.
When going to the next page, it displays 'Type not found'.
The dialog offers a type from a CU (Compilation Unit) in a different project.
SR:
1. Open the dialog.
2. Click on the browse button.
3. Observe that the browse button size is too small.
4. Observe that the title is used for long text.
5. Go to the next page.
6. Observe that the page displays 'Type not found'.
7. Browse and observe that the dialog offers a type from a CU in a different project.
